mapper.sql: id, cntr_no, cabinet_code, volume, cost, cid, status, ob_id, create_time
mapper.select: select t.id,t.cntr_no,t.cabinet_code,t.volume,t.cost,t.cid,t.status,t.ob_id,t.create_time, t1.name cabinetName, t2.currency_code ccode, t2.currency_name cname from ocean_counter t left join cabinet_type t1 on t1.id_code = t.cabinet_code left join currency_info t2 on t2.id = t.cid left join ocean_bill t3 on t3.id = t.ob_id where t3.id = #{obId}
select t.id from counter_case_info t JOIN counter_list_info t1 on t1.id = t.b_id JOIN ocean_counter t2 on t2.id = t1.counter_id WHERE t2.id = #{counterId}
select t.id from ocean_counter t where t.id = #{counterId}
